title: Update client admin login password and ensure special-character, case-sensitive validation

requirements.text: Update the Client Admin login to use the new strong password exactly as provided: "@ni#ra&j*gurja:r" (replacing the current simple password).

quotes: Replace the current simple password with this specific new strong password: @ni#ra&j*gurja:r

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/hooks/useClientAdminAuth.ts, the hardcoded admin password is replaced with exactly "@ni#ra&j*gurja:r".
Entering "@ni#ra&j*gurja:r" in the Client Admin login successfully unlocks and displays the admin panel/dashboard UI.
Entering any other password does not unlock the admin panel/dashboard UI and shows the existing error message.

requirements.text: Ensure the Client Admin login password input accepts special characters (including @, #, &, *, and :) and submits them unchanged for authentication comparison.

quotes: Ensure the login input field accepts special characters like @, #, &, *, and : without any errors.

acceptanceCriteria: The password input field in frontend/src/pages/ClientAdminPage.tsx allows typing and pasting special characters (@, #, &, *, :) without validation errors or character stripping.
The value passed into useClientAdminAuth.login() matches exactly what the user typed (no trimming, sanitizing, or normalization that would remove/alter these characters).

requirements.text: Ensure Client Admin password authentication remains strictly case-sensitive so that uppercase/lowercase letters must match exactly to unlock the admin panel/dashboard.

quotes: Make sure the password logic is case-sensitive (capital and small letters must match exactly).

acceptanceCriteria: "@ni#ra&j*gurja:r" unlocks the admin panel/dashboard, while any variant with different letter casing does not unlock it.
Authentication uses an exact string match (no case folding, no locale-based normalization).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text (e.g., validation/error messages).
nonGoals: Do not add or change Internet Identity / backend admin authorization (backend isAdmin) flows for this request.
Do not redesign the admin panel UI beyond what is required to accept and validate the new password.
